DESCRIPTION_ENTREPRENEURIAL_PLAN: Ideal for companies that want to offer personalized phone support services and improve customer experience.
FEATURE_FIVE_PLAN_ONE: Solution notification to the customer via multiple channels
FEATURE_SIX_PLAN_ONE: Reports and interaction with open incidents
DESCRIPTION_BUSINESS_PLAN: Ideal for companies that want to offer multiple communication channels and improve customer satisfaction.
FEATURE_ONE_PLAN_TWO: Multichannel: phone line, email, chatbot, and mobile app
FEATURE_TWO_PLAN_TWO: Registration of PQRs (Questions, Complaints, Claims) through all channels
FEATURE_FOUR_PLAN_TWO: Outbound calls for telemarketing and surveys
FEATURE_FIVE_PLAN_TWO: Dashboard for behavior and incident analysis
DESCRIPTION_BUSINESS_PLUS_PLAN: Ideal for companies that want to leverage artificial intelligence and predictive analytics to improve their customer experience.
FEATURE_ONE_PLAN_THREE: Registration of PQRs (Questions, Complaints, Claims) with predictive analytics
FEATURE_TWO_PLAN_THREE: Automatic responses based on generative AI
FEATURE_FOUR_PLAN_THREE: Dashboard with advanced analytics and prediction
FEATURE_FIVE_PLAN_THREE: Importing customer data to train models
